name: The Magic Candle 2: The Four and Forty
name_original: The Magic Candle 2: The Four and Forty
description:
The Magic Candle 2: The Four and Forty is a RPG game developed by Mindcraft Software. It was originally released in 1991. It was published by Mindcraft Software. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play The Magic Candle 2: The Four and Forty on PC.
